titles.title: Act to Ban OxyContin
To provide for the withdrawal of the drug OxyContin from the commercial market.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 5/5/2005--Introduced. Act to Ban OxyContin - Deems the application to distribute controlled-release oxycodone hydrochloride, which is marketed as OxyContin, in interstate commerce that was approved under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to have been withdrawn.
